#describing basic aspects of project

*Introduction*

Bittorent client in JAVA.
(Tool to provide better way of using P2P network)

_About Bittorent protocol_
 * Bit torrent is a P2P File Sharing protocol

 * Torrent file contains information about the files to be shared and the tracker    to contact

 * Tracker coordinates the peers exchanges for given torrent files



*What we are going to _Do_*

we are building a Java based bittorent client as we have already have a java based client called _Azerus_ but it is quiet complex with its functionality and naive user intelligence. Taking it as tombstone we making our effort to create a simple and reliable java based client in order to overcome the difficulties which has been seen earlier with Azerus.
